environment.city.parking

Class BlockFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.city.parking.BlockFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Monetary, Structure, ActionableByPolicyAgent

    public class BlockFace
extends java.lang.Object
implements Monetary, Structure, ActionableByPolicyAgent
    A block-face is one side of a street between two consecutive features intersecting that street. The features can be other streets or boundaries of standard geographic areas.
    Author:
    Simon Pageaud
    See Also:
    Block Face definition
